>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Valid Source Citation

id:: td-000028

######################################################################

This paragraph is followed by a valid citation to a source with ID
`dp95'. The citation does not refer to any spcific location in the
cited work. Design patterns are nifty. [cite:dp95].

This paragraph is followed by a valid citation to a source with ID
`dp95'. the citation contains a specific location within the cited
source. Design patterns are nifty. [cite:dp95, pg 6]

---SOURCE

source:: book

title:: Design Patterns -- Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented
Software

label:: dp95

author:: Erich Gamma

author:: Richard Helm

author:: Ralph Johnson

author:: John Vlissides

publisher:: Addison-Wesley

address:: One Jacob Way, Reading, Massachusetts 01867

year:: 1995

series:: Professional Computing Series

note:: ISBN 0-201-63361-2

---SOURCE

<<<DOCUMENT
